Response: Communicating effectively with members of the lab and if they are open, learning their background as well
Avoid idioms that lab members' who's first language is not English may not understand
Open to new ideas and opinions
Having variety of hours for lab activities
Respectful language, considering all identities, inclusivity statements/workshops
Try to consider restrictions when planning lab dinners or events
Spend more time listening to others, and learning about their experiences.
Make efforts to talk to everyone in the lab on a daily basis
Being open to new ideas or ways of thinking
